definition: freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: A typical case is in Chinese free sketch painting.
sentences.chinese: 中国写意画是“笔减而意繁”的典型个案。

sentences.english: Moreover, poetry and calligraphy have played an important role in the development of it.
sentences.chinese: 诗歌与书法对写意画的产生发展过程起了重要作用。

sentences.english: Free spirits permeate the development of Xieyihua and are decided by its philosophical basis.
sentences.chinese: 写意画的自由精神是它的哲学基础决定的。

definition: gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)
accurate depiction of architectural forms with the aid of a ruler (technique of Chinese art)/picture created using this technique
to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
line drawing in traditional ink and brush style/simple and straightforward style of writing
